description: Use typography to present your design and content as clearly and efficiently as possible.

important.title: Important
important.text1: Before using the component, make sure to import the font into the project. By default, Wuki UI uses Manrope font, here are a couple of examples of how to integrate it into your project:
important.text2: Then, you can import it in your entry-point.
important.text3: You can find all the basic information at

variant.title: Variations
variant.description: If you just use a component without any props, then it will not use any styles from the UI. To assign a variation from a theme, pass the `Variant` prop with the name of the variation.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: Often, for better semantics, you need to use semantic HTML tags. The `Tag` prop has been added specifically for this. This allows you, as a developer, to override the root tag of a component with whatever you think is best for you. Also, if your variation name coincides with a tag (ex: h1, small, p), then it will be connected automatically when using the tag.
